short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Password Generator extension to create strong passwords

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Password Generator extension to create strong passwords.
It includes features such as:
-password generation
-password history
-password settings
- minimum as well as maximum number of alphabetic characters,
- minimum and maximum number of numeric characters,
- minimum and maximum number of special characters,
- the total number of characters in the password component
- specify the existence of separators at intervals of X characters
- the number of passwords generated
